data.actual_result: You have "Select Everyone" and your user as options.
data.expected_result: There should only be a "Select Everyone" option, like desktop.
data.short_description: In a 1-user server Audit log, Filter Users gives you the option of Everyone and user.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a server without anyone being in it. - Go to Audit logs, and select "Filter by Users". - Observe.
